translations: n.[军]战争（war 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 玫瑰战争（十五世纪晚期爆发的英国内战）；蔷薇战争

sentences.sentence: He has lived through two world wars.
sentences.translation: 他经历了两次世界大战。

sentences.sentence: Many changes took place between the two world wars.
sentences.translation: 两次世界大战之间发生了很多变化。

sentences.sentence: Many senior citizens have been through two world wars.
sentences.translation: 许多年长的公民经历了两次世界大战。
